title: Calories in Toast with Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in toast with butter, including full nutrition breakdown per slice, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: 1 slice (28 g) white bread, toasted; topped with 1 tsp (5 g) salted butter; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, butter brand, portion size, and toasting method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of toast with butter provides ~110 kcal, with 3 g protein and 5 g fat.

basis.label: per 1 slice toast with 1 tsp butter

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of toast with butter?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal for 1 slice white toast with 1 tsp butter.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in toast with butter?
faqs.a: Around 15 g carbs per slice, mostly from the bread.

faqs.q: Does butter add a lot of fat to toast?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tsp butter adds ~5 g fat, including 3 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in toast with butter?
faqs.a: Use less butter, opt for whole grain bread, or choose a low-fat spread.

faqs.q: Is toast with butter high in sodium?
faqs.a: Moderately; ~170 mg per slice due to salted butter and bread.
